verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:5
verses.text: They have corrupted themselves, their spot is not the spot of his children: they are a perverse and crooked generation.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:6
verses.text: Do ye thus requite the Lord, O foolish people and unwise? is not he thy father that hath bought thee? hath he not made thee, and established thee?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:7
verses.text: Remember the days of old, consider the years of many generations: ask thy father, and he will shew thee; thy elders, and they will tell thee.
